Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:28:34 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Two pack you will get: 1* cat feeder, 1* cat water dispenser. Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.1 gallon Large capacity: You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party after choose our automatic cat feeders.Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base of the dog feeder and features a wide mouth for convenient hand-washing.

With automatic gravity flow technology, the automatic pet feeder no electricity required at all, can be used both indoor and outdoor.The Structure of our automatic dog feeder is stable, will not tip over.

High Quality Materials

The automatic pet feeder is made from high-quality plastic material, BPA – free, safe, healthy and environmental protection, perfect care of your love pet.

Easy to Add Food

Uncover the cap on the top of the dog food bowls, you can add dry pet food easily. After the lid is closed, the grain can be kept away from damp and moldy with a good sealing.

Large Groove

With 15 degree carefully slope and a large groove of the pet feeder, Food comes out smoothly and no food stuck, friendly for pets to eat and drink.

Non-slip Rubber Feet

Non-slip rubber feet under the base of dog feeder and dog water dispenser for secure safe placement. The automatic dog feeder can be used both indoor or outdoor with no electric needed.

Siphon Design

The screw cover the bottle of the dog water bowl dispenser is made of siphon design. When the water in the dog water bowl reaches a certain height, the spring device which on the cat water dispenser will close and the water stops flowing automatically.

3.8L Big capacity

The cat water bowl can hold about 3.8 L water, can satisfy your small medium or big pets at the same time, about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets.

Questions and Answers：

Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?A: Usually, the first day when he use the automatic dog feeder, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.Q: Will the water overflow?A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?Our dog water bowl dispenser and dog food bowls set is made from food grade plastic material, it is safe and tasteless.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 27 x 17.5 x 35.5 inches; 3.95 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 22, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hipidog
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08X4J54R1

[High Quality Food Grade Materials]: The automatic water dispenser for dogs is made from high-quality plastic material, BPA – free, safe, healthy and environmental protection, perfect care of your love pet. The cat bowls for food and water is 100% new material, anti-fall durable.
[Automatic Refills Food and Water with Gravity]: Automatic cat feeders system with self-gravity feeding design for this automatic pet feeder, to dispense dry food as pets empty the bowl, prolonging time between refills. The water bowls for large dogs adopt siphon device design, can perfect prevention of water leakage, control the speed of drinking water supply to prevent overflow.
[Big Capacity for Small Medium Large Pets]: Both cat food dispenser and cat water dispenser with large capacity 3.8L. Can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets. You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party, do not have to worry about pets will be hungry.
[Humanization Design Convenient to Use]: With 15 degree carefully slope design, The dog food bowls will not stuck food. The upgraded base is thicker and heavier, would not tip over when pets eating. And non-skid rubber feet under the dog feeder and dog water bottle dispenser for secure placement. Moreover, barrel and chassis of the automatic dog feeder can be split, you can rinse it directly with water. It is recommended to wash once a week.

  • Two pack you will get: 1* cat feeder, 1* cat water dispenser.
  • Food Grade Material: Our pet feeder made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.
  • Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The automatic cat feeders refills with water and food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.
  • 1 gallon Large capacity: You can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party after choose our automatic cat feeders.
  • Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base of the dog feeder and features a wide mouth for convenient hand-washing.

Read more

  • With automatic gravity flow technology, the automatic pet feeder no electricity required at all, can be used both indoor and outdoor.
  • The Structure of our automatic dog feeder is stable, will not tip over.

High Quality Materials

  • A: Usually, the first day when he use the automatic dog feeder, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.

  • Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?

item.title: Swagger: Super Bowls, Brass Balls, and Footballs―A Memoir
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From FOX NFL Sunday analyst and legendary Hall of Fame head football coach Jimmy Johnson—the first to win both a college football championship and a Super Bowl—the long-awaited, intimate, no-regrets memoir recounting his extraordinary life and insightful lessons on winning, at every level. Hall of Fame football coach Jimmy Johnson’s ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:41 UTC – Details)


From FOX NFL Sunday analyst and legendary Hall of Fame head football coach Jimmy Johnson—the first to win both a college football championship and a Super Bowl—the long-awaited, intimate, no-regrets memoir recounting his extraordinary life and insightful lessons on winning, at every level.

Hall of Fame football coach Jimmy Johnson’s house isn’t on the way to anything. Yet, his private sanctuary on the Florida Keys’ Islamorada islands is a popular destination to which college and professional coaches, general managers, and team owners regularly trek to seek advice—how to build a positive team culture, draft elite players, balance work and family life, and lead a team to win. Why? Because Jimmy Johnson has done it all—rising through the college coaching ranks to lead the University of Miami Hurricanes to a national championship, winning two consecutive Super Bowls with the Dallas Cowboys, and handling public triumphs while dealing with private adversity. Now, in Swagger, written with veteran sports journalist Dave Hyde, Johnson shares a candid account of his life experiences that have turned him into a legend in the coaching world.

From his early days on the college football fields at Louisiana Tech to his arrival as the Cowboys’ coach in 1989, Swagger traces the history of Johnson’s career, and his lifelong mission to win. His larger-than-life personality and hard-driving, tough-talking coaching style led him to become one of only six coaches in NFL history to win back-to-back Super Bowls. Swagger shows the behind-the-scenes details of his professional conflict with Cowboys owner Jerry Jones and his personal revelations following his mother’s death and his son’s struggle with addiction. It reveals Johnson’s formula for winning, including his criteria for identifying talent, his core beliefs, how he replaced legendary coaches like Tom Landry and Don Shula, coached stars from a young Troy Aikman to an aging Dan Marino, and established the ever-elusive sense of “culture” that every team leader hopes to achieve. More than a highlight reel, Swagger reveals the hard-won lessons Jimmy Johnson has learned both as a man and as a coach through a lifetime dedicated to excellence.

From the Publisher

Publisher ‏ : ‎ Scribner (November 15, 2022)
Language ‏ : ‎ English
Hardcover ‏ : ‎ 288 pages
ISBN-10 ‏ : ‎ 1668008629
ISBN-13 ‏ : ‎ 978-1668008621
Item Weight ‏ : ‎ 1.04 pounds
Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 1.2 x 9 inches

Read more

Read more

Read more

item.title: Neater Feeder Express Elevated Dog – Raised Pet Dish – Stainless Steel Food and Water Bowls for Small to Large Dogs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Problem Solving Pet Products We specialize in innovative products to help with common daily pet issues, including messy pets, fast eaters, litter boxes, and more. Neater Pets started in 2009 with the invention of the Neater Feeder. Seeing spilled food and water all around dog bowls, we ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:23 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Problem Solving Pet Products

We specialize in innovative products to help with common daily pet issues, including messy pets, fast eaters, litter boxes, and more.

Neater Pets started in 2009 with the invention of the Neater Feeder. Seeing spilled food and water all around dog bowls, we came up with a cleaner, better way to feed pets. Since then, we’ve expanded to bring pet lovers even more solutions to everyday pet life.

About Us

We are a small, family-owned business based out of the suburbs of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. We design, manufacture, and ship most of our products here in the USA!

What problem are we solving?

We specialize in products to solve everyday pet problems, especially pet messes. Our best-sellers include a mess-proof pet bowl, the Neater Feeder, and a mess-proof litter scoop, the Neater Scooper.

Why do we love what we do?

Inspired by our own pets, we love that we get to help simplify life for our fellow animal lovers.

A Few of Our Best-Sellers

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.8 x 4.8 x 12.9 inches; 1.3 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ KW35342
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 25, 2013
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Neater Feeder
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00DMHOZOK
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

MADE FOR SMALL DOGS – Designed for small dogs up to 9″ at shoulder & up to 18 lbs in weight.
SAVE TIME CLEANING – Spills and messes are completely contained within the feeder, saving you time cleaning floors and walls.
DISHWASHER SAFE – All parts of the feeder including dog bowls as well as top and bottom basins are 100% dishwasher safe.
RUBBER FEET – Comes equipped with non-skid rubber feet on the bottom of each leg to prevent sliding.

No More Messy Floors!

The Neater Feeder catches spilled food and water to keep your floors spotless!

Read more

Neater Feeder Express for Small Dogs

Say goodbye to wet and messy feeding areas thanks to Neater Feeder’s revolutionary splash guard & dual reservoir design. Spilled food is contained in the upper reservoir while spilled water drains safely to the lower reservoir below to protect your floors and walls from stains and damage. Regular old fashioned dog bowls or dog dishes don’t even come close!

The Neater Feeder is also an elevated feeder. Using raised bowls helps your dog to eat easily and comfortably — reducing joint pain and improving digestion.

Includes two stainless steel bowls to accommodate small dog sized portions. One 1.5 cup food bowl and one 1.5 cup water bowl.

Read more

Product Specifications

  • For Small Dog Breeds such as Chihuahua, Yorkie, Lhasa Apso
  • Bowl Sizes – 1.5 cup food and 1.5 cup water bowls
  • Unit Dimensions – 12.9″ x 8.75″ x 4.75″
  • Feeding Height – 2.75″
  • Splash Guard Height – 2″
  • Feeder is Made in the USA
  • Bowls are Made in India
  • 100% Dishwasher Safe

Read more

With any elevated feeder, getting the right size is crucial. Please measure your pet to find the feeder that will provide the most comfortable height.

Neater Feeder Dimensions





Neater Feeder Express Small Dog
Neater Feeder Deluxe Small Dog
Neater Feeder Deluxe Small Dog with Leg Extensions
Mess-Proof Feeder Keeps Floors Clean & Dry
✓
✓
✓
Splash Guard Height 2″ 3″ 3″
Feeding Height 2.75″ 3″ 4.5″
Bowl Sizes 1.5 Cup Food, 1.5 Cup Water 1.5 Cup Food, 2.2 Cup Water 1.5 Cup Food, 2.2 Cup Water
Includes Leg Extensions for Extra Height Not Compatible Not Included but Compatible
✓

4.5
Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:23 UTC – Details)

item.title: The Original Doggy Bag™ by Rubyloo-Dog Travel Bag for Supplies with 2 BPA-Free Travel Dog Bowls, 2 Dog Food Travel Containers-A Dog Travel Kit for Road Trips or Weekend Away. Airline Approved
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we’ve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Bag Dimensions
15″ x 13″ x 7″ 17″ x 11″ x 6″

Bowl Diameter
7″ 5″

Food Container Capacity
16 cups (8 cups each) 12 cups

Placemat
16″ x 12″

Poop Bag Dispenser

✓

✓

Water Resistant Fabric

✓

✓

Removable Divider

✓

✓

Luggage Handle Sleeve

✓

✓

Lined Treat Bag

✓

Removable Shoulder Strap

✓

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15 x 7 x 13 inches; 2.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 17, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ rubyloo
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B087N9J3DX
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Dog Diaper Bag, Anyone? As dog owners, we know what really makes life with dogs easier. We added the poop bag dispenser to the puppy travel bag so you never end up in a ‘stinky’ situation again! Our travel dog bag set is a great idea for dog mom, dog dad, and pet lover gifts!
Do You Want A Clean And Organized Car? Our removable divider and multiple pockets keep your and your dog’s essentials organized for your next beach, hiking, or overnight road trip! All your dog camping gear and travel supplies in one dog travel bag – always good to go. Our dog bags for traveling are airline-approved and feature a handy suitcase sleeve.
Good Dogs Deserve Great Gear! With premium padded straps for comfort and generous storage for dog travel accessories, you can carry the comforts of home on the go. Trust our commitment to quality with our portable dog food travel bags with high-quality zippers & water-resistant fabric. A sustainable substitute for plastic bags!
100% Lifetime Manufacturer Guarantee. At Rubyloo (Formerly Lucky Tail), it’s our mission to reinvent dog products to make your life better together. We’re a US-based company that provides innovation and quality you can trust. With our ‘Every Dog Should Have A Home’ initiative, your purchase will help a rescue find their forever home.

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we’ve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Read more

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Backpack for Dog Supplies

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It’s Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags… everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Read more

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Long-Lasting Feeding: The 5L/21 Cups food storage will keep most pets comfortably fed for several weeks. The double bowl food dispenser is a perfect solution to feed 2 cats at same time and and won’ t have any fights.
Voice Record Meal Call: The auto feeder allows you to record a 10s short voice message when it’s mealtime to create a strong bond and makes your pets fed regularly, feeling safe with well cared even when you’re absent. Due to the setting lock of the LCD screen, pets can’t play with or mess up programming.
Dual Power Protection: The pet food dispenser works with a 5V DC adapter, also stores three D-size batteries (NOT included) as a backup power supply. Unplanned power outages won’t interrupt the your feeder’s programming and deprive your furry friend of dinner. Giving you more holiday flexibility.
Safe and Reliable Feeder: A desiccant bag and the secure lock lid not only keeps the food fresh but also prevents your pet from accessing stored food. The detachable design allows a thorough cleaning to reduce bacterial growth, makes your life easier and pets healthier.
